org.apache.hadoop.util.ExitUtil.ExitException

  • Packages that use ExitUtil.ExitException 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.security  
    org.apache.hadoop.service.launcher
    This package contains classes, interfaces and exceptions to launch YARN services from the command line.

      A service launch exception that includes an exit code.

      Convert an exception to an ExitException.

      Get the exit exception used to end this service.
      ExitUtil.ExitException ServiceLauncher.launchService(Configuration conf, List<String> processedArgs, boolean addShutdownHook, boolean execute)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
